task.summary: Added tests, refactored ComponentArray into a subclass of the abstract ComponentStorage, and implemented ComponentMap (another subclass of ComponentStorage).

Across-the-board refactors.
Minor changes to apollo.hpp to reflect file changes. Removed ComponentArray to migrate to a generic Storage model. Refactored Entity to be index-based. Created EntityManager to handle creating and recycling new Entities. Created MapStorage, a "trivial" implementation of the new Storage model. Also created its respective iterators. Removed ResourceAccessor's implementation in preparation for its refactor. Changed ResourceSubscription to use std::unordered_set instead of std::set. Removed ResourceWrapper as any type is now allowed to be a resource. Created Storage as a generic interface for component storage implementations. Created read/write iterator interfaces as well. Refactored System to be simpler. Removed the TypeManager object. Refactored Types to be statically determined instead of attached to a TypeManager object. Deleted most of the World implementation in preparation for refactor. Minor other changes to tests and other files.

Removed ResourceAccessor's implementation in preparation for its refactor. Changed ResourceSubscription to use std::unordered_set instead of std::set. Removed ResourceWrapper as any type is now allowed to be a resource. Created Storage as a generic interface for component storage implementations. Created read/write iterator interfaces as well. Refactored System to be simpler. Removed the TypeManager object. Refactored Types to be statically determined instead of attached to a TypeManager object. Deleted most of the World implementation in preparation for refactor. Minor other changes to tests and other files.

Minor changes to apollo.hpp to reflect file changes. Removed ComponentArray to migrate to a generic Storage model. Refactored Entity to be index-based.
